title: Linq2DynamoDb.WepApi.OData
description: A set of extensions to Linq2DynamoDb.DataContext for use in ASP.Net WebApi projects.

packOptions.summary: A set of extensions to Linq2DynamoDb.DataContext for use in ASP.Net WebApi projects.
packOptions.releaseNotes: This initial release provides DynamoDbController class, which simplifies creating OData controllers on top of Linq2DynamoDb.DataContext.
